label: 大覚寺
本: From Sovereign to Symbol: An Age of Ritual Determinism in Fourteenth Century Japan . Oxford University Press . 2012
説明文: Shingon temple rebuilt by Go-Uda in 1307, and the site where ritual texts and objects affiliated with his honorable lineage" of unified Shingon practice were stored. Ashikaga armies consigned this structure to the flames in 1336."
